name: Among Trees
summary: A small vibrant survival sandbox, Among Trees is set in a colorful wilderness world teeming with life. Explore a colorful, breathing world that is filled to the brim with life. From dense forests to dark caves.
info:
• 开发: FJRD Interactive
  • 发行: FJRD Interactive
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Survival simulator
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020年6月13日 (Early Access)
  • 官方网站: https://www.amongtreesgame.com/
